column2: Rajagiriya - Fully Furnished Apartment for Rent
column6: Located in a beautiful surrounding overlooking the Diyawanna Lake amidst lush Greenery it is only 600 meters to the Rajagiriya Junction and less than a Kilometer to Leading Super Markets, Hospitals, Shopping Complexes and places of religious worship. This new apartment comprises of 2 bedrooms of which the master bedroom has an adjining toilet and there is also a separate common toilet. A separate area has been set up for the domestics with a bedroom and another toilet. It is fully furnished and fully air conditioned (energy efficient air-conditioning) and comes with a refrigerator, a fully automatic top loader washing machine, cooker hood with a 4 burner cooker, a microwave oven and LED Television. The sliding windows have protection against mosquito's which aren't many. The common areas comprise of a Gymnasium, a roof top terrace overlooking the Diyawanna Lake from one side and the Port City from the other. Whilst the common facilities include a Gymnasium, Elevator and a stand-by Back up Generator. There is no swimming pool. The apartment has facility for 1 Car Park which is located on the ground floor.
